personal.name: Amos Cohen
personal.title: Product Manager
personal.profile: I am a driven product creator with diverse experience in engineering, design, and business. My track record includes solving complex problems and navigating technical challenges by applying analytical thinking, logic, and accelerated self-learning. When I'm not thinking about problems, you will find me cooking Middle Eastern food, listening to music, or fragging n00bs in CS:GO.

responsibilities: Crafted a vision and strategy, translated strategy to a backlog, staffed a cross-functional scrum including a junior PM, engaged with executives to approve internal budget, and supervised day-to-day operations as a product lead to transition an automated tool that benchmarks the quality and competitiveness of web pages from proof-of-concept to MVP.  Supported 40+ sales pursuits and helped convert 7 of them to $4M+ in revenue.

Identified an internal unmet need, assembled a cross-functional team, and created a vision and strategy as a project lead to launch an internal qualitative intelligence platform. Post proof-of-concept, product received internal funding to facilitate client-facing use cases.

Created user stories, defined technical requirements, and groomed epics with a cross-functional scrum as a product owner to deliver features from inception to production in an agile workstream for a healthcare Salesforce implementation project.

Drove scrum ceremonies, gathered and prioritized feature requirements, managed JIRA, conducted QA, and owned UI/UX as a product manager in a 12-person cross-functional scrum to deliver SaaS MVP aimed at helping clients adapt to new data protection regulations while maintaining advertising returns. Led a demo to a strategic partner in the tech industry which unlocked $700K of investment.
Managed end-to-end web implementation projects for 20+ clients in Israel, from concept to production.
Designed and developed 12+ ecommerce experiences for small businesses using WordPress and Shopify to adapt to changing demand for custom solutions.
Championed a lean approach to onboard retail experiences online using an iterative approach (build-measure-learn feedback loop).
Provided programming support to over 500+ collegiate athlete websites and successffully implemented customer support issues.
Implemented ADA-compliant code written in HTML and C# for over 50% of the companyâ€™s portfolio, resulting in WCAG AA compliance.
Consulted to student-startups in different stages (ideation, acceleration, investment).
Prepared students for pitch competitions and guided founders to create investment-ready assets for their ventures. Three of those startups were funded with over $2M seed investments.
Launched a weekly revenue stream that added a 10% recurring revenue for the firm.
Created and executed a digital strategy that included launching an ecommerce channel targeted at three universities located in the vicinity.
Served as Commander, Sergeant and Company Sergeant Major. Commanded 6 cycles of new recruits over the course of 3 years, leading and guiding hundreds of recruits.
